item.title: Some iPhones Could Be Banned in the U.S. Over Stolen Trade Secrets
item.description: Some iPhone 15, 16, and 17 models could be banned in the United States amid a preliminary ruling that Chinese display maker BOE infringed on Samsung’s OLED trade secrets (via Korea’s ETNews). A prelim
